select idModul,idInduk,kodeDetail,noModul,namaModul,uraianModul,sum(kodeOtoritas) kodeOtoritas from( select a.i_id as idModul,a.i_idinduk as idInduk, a.c_detail as kodeDetail,a.i_modul_no as noModul, a.n_modul as namaModul, a.e_modul as uraianModul, 0 as kodeOtoritas from trbkusmodul a where 1=1
and
a.c_modul_superadmin = '1'
a.c_modul_admin = '1'
a.c_modul_sudin = '1'
a.c_modul_PA = '1'
a.c_modul_PK = '1'
union all select a.i_id as idModul,a.i_idinduk as idInduk, a.c_detail as kodeDetail,a.i_modul_no as noModul, a.n_modul as namaModul, a.e_modul as uraianModul, 1 as kodeOtoritas from trbkusmodul a, trbkuspenggunamodul b where b.i_idmodul = a.i_id and b.i_idpengguna = #{idpengguna} ) group by idModul,idInduk,kodeDetail,noModul,namaModul,uraianModul order by idModul

select count(*) as banyak from(select idModul,idInduk,kodeDetail,noModul,namaModul,uraianModul,sum(kodeOtoritas) kodeOtoritas from( select a.i_id as idModul,a.i_idinduk as idInduk, a.c_detail as kodeDetail,a.i_modul_no as noModul, a.n_modul as namaModul, a.e_modul as uraianModul, 0 as kodeOtoritas from trbkusmodul a union all select a.i_id as idModul,a.i_idinduk as idInduk, a.c_detail as kodeDetail,a.i_modul_no as noModul, a.n_modul as namaModul, a.e_modul as uraianModul, 1 as kodeOtoritas from trbkusmodul a, trbkuspenggunamodul b where b.i_idmodul = a.i_id and b.i_idpengguna = #{idpengguna} ) group by idModul,idInduk,kodeDetail,noModul,namaModul,uraianModul order by 1)
